Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory598.jpg'}
{3: 'The biting chill hints at impending snowfall.'}
{3: "Hauling Noan back up to the tower's summit, your face drains of color as you struggle for air."}
{3: 'The young man, summoned by name, approaches, checking you for any potential injuries.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Any other wounds?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Noan's demeanor is eerily composed."}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Don't sweat it.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With those words, crimson liquid coats the young man's hands, trickling down to the floor, forming macabre patterns like viscous blooms."}
{3: 'He seems like a broken instrument, struggling to produce a melody amidst turbulent seas.'}
{2: '...', 3: '21', 4: '(If that\'s so, which "strings" were you referring to?)', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "What's the matter?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Can you share what's on your mind?", 3: '23'}
{2: 'Why would you risk your life?', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Are you seriously considering facing off against Lithos in his place?', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Given Dark Aries' current plight, the only shot at improvement lies in uprooting the source of the problem.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'This could be our chance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Lithos would rather see the "original that\'s replicable." Let me handle it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you believe this is a rational choice?', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "If it's the only way out, it's not entirely unreasonable, is it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Even if we only manage to eliminate a few replicas and gather intel... it's better than sitting idle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'True, this could alleviate some of the issues caused by Lithos.', 3: '40'}
{2: 'But where does that leave you? Can you return unscathed?', 3: '41'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "That's what I should be asking, right...", 4: '1'}
{3: "A crack finally appears in Noan's composed demeanor."}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'These lingering issues and people have ensnared my team and pulled you into this mess.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No one can clean it up entirely, Noan.', 3: '49', 4: "As long as we're breathing, these things will arise. I'm no exception.", 5: '49'}
{2: "The Noan I know wouldn't act on impulse like this.", 3: '51'}
{2: 'Did something else go down?', 3: '52'}
{3: 'He glances up, bewildered, as if the answer lies before his eyes...'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "You've already been snatched by Bethe once.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Didn't I warn you clearly enough last time?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Because I only divulged his identity, not the depths of his depravity nor the difficulty of confronting someone who's abandoned their morals...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Remember when we trailed him to rescue someone?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'After prying open three doors, we stumbled upon the innermost one in his lair, rigged with delicate fishing lines.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Breaking those lines while opening the door... it was like using someone\'s scream as his "doorbell."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'And all those lines were tied to the same person... we were trying to rescue.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "When you mentioned April 1st's disappearance was linked to Bethe, I felt a fleeting relief, thinking Lithos was holding him back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Ha... Lithos was holding him back...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noan weakly shuts his eyes, his hidden emotions leaking out like the blood on his hands.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'If these things happen to you or Commandant Simon, how could I...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He chokes on the rest of his sentence.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'This was my solo mission, unauthorized—I shouldn\'t have "borrowed" your aid.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Leaving the Clean Zone was a last resort. At the time, I assumed you'd return with Commandant Simon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Even if begrudgingly, after splitting up, Captain Palma would've escorted you back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "She'd do it forcefully—she always protects those she trusts.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Even if she couldn't locate you, I had an arrangement with you to call me or Gray Raven for help if danger arose.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Even if I couldn't handle it and wasn't dependable, the invincible Gray Raven would always come through, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'But then Bethe sent word that you were taken by "another me."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I really don't want to witness that again, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Just when I dare to hope for a brighter future, it all darkens.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "No matter how much I try to keep myself grounded and composed, there's always something throwing me off balance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I start to question... maybe this composure itself is a mistake?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '"Wouldn\'t act on impulse like this," huh?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He lets out a rueful chuckle.'}
{2: 'Sorry for causing you worry.', 3: '97', 4: '(Pat his shoulder)', 5: '97', 6: '(Hug Noan)', 7: '92'}
{3: "Noan's body trembles slightly, caught off guard by your embrace."}
{3: 'He raises his blood-stained hands, wanting to reciprocate but fearing staining the coat.'}
{3: 'After a hesitant pause, he embraces you tightly, letting go of rationality for a moment.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Well... I'm just glad you're okay now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Try putting a bit more trust in me.', 3: '101'}
{2: "I wouldn't take risks without being prepared.", 3: '102'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "You could've given me a heads-up, you know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Uh, it all went down in the blink of an eye.', 3: '105'}
{2: 'And that was also "Noan", right?', 3: '106'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'He was seriously considering offing me just now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Until he recovers his full memory, it's best to treat him like an adversary.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Does regaining memory mean being pals?', 3: '110'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Sounds like tomorrow's stale bread to me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'What would you do with bread about to go bad?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scarf it down pronto.', 3: '114', 4: 'Toss it out.', 5: '114'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Yeah, that\'s what "I" would do too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Once memories come flooding back, facing up to past deeds...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'No, the bigger worry now is that Lithos won\'t let "him" remember.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Perhaps we could still hoodwink Lithos.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He cast a worried glance at the sea below the lighthouse.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "He's definitely still kicking, right...", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're not thinking of picking up where we left off, are you?", 3: '122'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's been ages. We probably can't catch up now.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You haven't lost hope at all!", 3: '124', 4: 'You...', 5: '124'}
{2: "Anyway, let's head back first and then mull this over.", 3: '125'}
{2: "What's the matter?", 3: '127'}
{3: 'Noan quietly recounts what went down when he met Simon.'}
{3: "Simon's interrogation, and that bottle he didn't get a chance to ask about."}
{3: 'Then, he saw Palma whisper something to Simon, and Simon took a shot at Noan.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Can we still go back?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll help smooth things over.", 3: '133'}
{2: "It might not go swimmingly, but there's always a way.", 3: '134'}
{2: 'Also, I think Atiel might be a factor.', 3: '136'}
{2: 'Yeah, better ask Simon about that.', 3: '138', 4: 'Just... it might not be wise for me to chime in.', 5: '138'}
{3: 'You lower your head with a sigh.'}
{2: "I guess we've got no other choice.", 3: '140'}
{2: "We'll hash it out with Simon when we return.", 3: '141'}
{3: 'His voice is calm as he fully agrees.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Let's give Captain Palma a taste of her own medicine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Making her aware of the consequences might make her think twice next time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "But... I didn't expect you to propose such a cunning plan, oh great expert of unity and friendship.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Hey, it's just a tactic.", 3: '150', 4: "In that case, I'll trust you to keep it under wraps.", 5: '150'}
{2: "Simon tends to take things pretty seriously, so don't overdo it.", 3: '151', 4: 'Make sure to give him a heads-up beforehand.', 5: '151'}
{2: "And let's not use this as an excuse to settle old scores, okay?", 3: '153'}
{3: 'Noan gives a knowing smile.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the smile fades from his lips, a sorrow that always lingered beneath the surface finally emerges on his face.'}
{2: "Let's head back. There's plenty to do... Achoo!", 3: '158'}
{3: 'Amidst the biting cold wind, you sneeze twice.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "You're out here without enough layers. Should I call Gray Raven to pick you up?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No need, there are no missions for the next few days.', 3: '162', 4: "I've already let them know not to worry.", 5: '162'}
{2: "It's not urgent, after all.", 3: '163'}
{2: "There's a base about 7 kilometers away; we can catch a transport back.", 3: '164'}
{2: "Let's do it.", 3: '165', 4: "Let's head back together.", 5: '165'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory597.jpg'}
{3: 'Leaving the lighthouse behind, you walk toward the base along streets where the snow still lay thick.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{3: 'Walking silently side by side, neither of you speaks much along the way.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'When you glance up again, the sky is filled with falling snowflakes.'}
{3: 'He watches them drift down, his gaze growing distant.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's snowing...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's snowing again.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We're almost at the base...", 3: '184'}
{2: 'Still worried about "that" Noan?', 3: '187'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I don't know how much longer I'll be of use, or how many more people I'll have to harm.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Even Lithos might become suspicious, and even if I could deceive them, there would be consequences.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "And... I've found no evidence of my own replication.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You show Noan the terminal in your hand.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'When did you get that?', 4: '1'}
{2: "As I said, I'm the commandant.", 3: '195'}
{2: 'How could I be taken without some preparation?', 3: '196'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'To gather this evidence?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not solely for that reason.', 3: '198'}
{2: 'I even considered trying to persuade "that you" to come to Babylonia.', 3: '199'}
{3: 'His expression grows subtly complex.'}
{2: 'Are you truly so incompatible?', 3: '202'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "No, it's not that. But in some matters, having just one of me is trouble enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'And I can be selfish too. There are things I\'d rather not trade or share, even with "me."', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Hand back the mechanical firefly to Noan)', 3: '208'}
{2: 'He initially intended to assist Bethe...', 3: '209'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...But got distracted by the firefly?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'And then, I happened upon the conversation between you and Bethe.', 3: '212'}
{2: 'Is this... some kind of coincidence?', 3: '213'}
{2: 'When you handed back the terminal...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory711.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan?', 3: 'For some reason, it felt like hearing a long-lost friend telling me to "wait."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan?', 3: "And when I turned around, there it was, what I'd been searching for so long, in your hands...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{2: "His true nature hasn't veered too far off course.", 3: '229'}
{2: "He'll regain all his memories sooner or later.", 3: '230'}
{2: "We've done everything we could.", 3: '231'}
{3: 'Noan responds in silence.'}
{2: '(Extend a hand to Noan)', 3: '233'}
{3: 'Noan also reaches out his hand to reciprocate, but then pauses as if sensing something...'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Just a moment.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He glances around, swiftly makes his way to the roadside, scoops up a handful of snow, and uses it to cleanse the blood and vital fluid seeping from the wound on his hand.'}
{3: 'After a few moments of silent contemplation, he hastily wraps the wound with a bandage, then returns to you and takes your hand.'}
{3: 'It is only at this moment that the soul trapped in the stocks slowly comes to its senses.'}
{2: 'Do you dislike snow?', 3: '242'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's alright, I'm fine now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Let's go back.", 4: '1'}
